page.title: 11THE STORY OF ST. JOHN OF GOD
page.content: John Ciudad was a poor shepherd boy who was born in Portugal in 1495.Then he travelled around from place to place.He took part in a Crusade.In North Africa he worked at building up thr fortifications.The other workers were convicts and he was treated as badly as they were.He was 55. John went back to Spain.He saw all the cripples and he went begging for money to look after them.One day the home caught fire and he saved every one of them.Some people said he must be mad and some people called him John of God.One day a boy fell into the river and John went in to save him.The boy drowned and John died of pneumonia soon afterwards. Our hospital is called St.John of God hospital because he is the patron saint of hospitals and nurses.
